name: silverback
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also silverback gorilla, uk/ˌsɪl.və.bæk ɡəˈrɪl.ə/ us/ˌsɪl.vɚ.bæk ɡəˈrɪl.ə/) an older male gorilla (= a large ape) that has white or silver hair on its back and is the dominant (= controlling) member of its group: The large 21-year-old silverback keeps a wary eye over his family group.
David Schenfeld/500px Prime/GettyImages
an older man who likes to have power and control over other people: For at least 40 years Norman Mailer was the silverback of the literary scene.
